Adventurer Helper:
Certainly!
All volunteers must hunt the *Chimera Pieces,* *Soldier of Ancient Times, Changed Creations,* *Warrior of Ancient Times, Shaman of Ancient* *Times, Ancient Creature, Forgotten Ancient* *People, Forgotten Face, and Giant`s Shadow,* all found in the Silent Valley, until you find a *50* *Relic Boxes*. These are the research materials that we so desperately crave.
